name: Network-Integrated Multimedia Middleware

screenshots.caption: NMM is a multimedia middleware framework

short_description: The Network-Integrated Multimedia Middleware (NMM) is a flow graph based multimedia framework that allows to create distributed multimedia applications: local and remote multimedia devices or software components can be combined.
